original_text: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.
korean_text: 몸 가운데서 분쟁이 없고 오직 여러 지체가 서로 같이 돌보게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: That there should be no schism in the body;
but that the members should have the same care
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 지체들이 서로 동일한 돌봄을 가지며
